name: dfifp5
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wo(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

stmt.origin: bitri(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wo(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

stmt.origin: anbi1i(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2), wo(wn(w0), w1))

body.origin:

comment: Alternate definition of the conditional operator for propositions. (Contributed by BJ, 2-Oct-2019.)
